frontmatter.title: Working with Unity and GitHub
frontmatter.excerpt: Working with Unity makes development easy. You can quickly prototype a game and show it off. But what if there are multiple developers. Storing your source code on GitHub makes collaboration easy; but there are a lot of tradeoffs when working with larger assets and projects.

frontmatter.title: Performance tuning for mobile VR
frontmatter.excerpt: Whatever you learned tuning the performance for mobile or for desktop or console games might not apply to mobile VR.
